items.title: Decrease load time
items.description: The application takes too long to load.  Need helping optimizing page so it loads faster.

items.title: Search not filtering correctly
items.description: When a user searches a term with a filter, the filter is not being taken into account.

items.title: New feature for a thing
items.description: Would be nice if a user could do a thing using this new feature.  Its a nice to have and would make the overall experience better.
